page.title: 02FOCUS ON M62 MOTORWAY.(1)
page.content: To find out the amount,and categories,of traffic using the motorway passing through the area on a week day, we did several counts with the following results. On average,the number of vehicles passing throughthe village of Whitley Bridge via the M62, on a week day is approximately 11,500. 47% of which are goods vehicles, an equal proportion of private vehicles,and only 6% being passenger vehicles such as coaches and mini buses. During the day, many vehicles enter and leave the Motorway at the junctions at Whitley Bridge.The majority of the vehicles joining the Motorway due West are from Selby, the rest are from Doncaster, which is a major mining town to the South of the area.
